channel.title: CVE Feed for markdown-it -- markdown-it

item.title: CVE-2022-21670|2024-08-03T02:46:39.537Z -- markdown-it -- markdown-it
item.description: markdown-it is a Markdown parser. Prior to version 1.3.2, special patterns with length greater than 50 thousand characterss could slow down the parser significantly. Users should upgrade to version 12.3.2 to receive a patch. There are no known workarounds aside from upgrading.
